Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned a huge amount because I've been tested and, more importantly, I've been trusted

Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to age with some dignity

Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: Bob Dylan did the first really long record - Like A Rolling Stone - I think it was four minutes

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: A green-light meeting is when the decision is made finally whether or not to make a given picture

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: The green-light decision process today consists of maybe of 30 or 40 people

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: One of Brando's problems is that he can't have a conversation with anyone

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: Hollywood is going to have to find a way of meeting those profit goals

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't hanging around the movie theaters in New York where I grew up, a Manhattan brat

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: Most movie-goers are overdosing on star coverage; it's the ultimate example of too much information

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: Study the public behavior of top stars and you can detect a keen attentiveness to brand value

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: That's how you get surprises, because what movies are all about is surprises

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest danger of Hollywood becoming a purely corporate town resides in the creative process

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: We're going to see a very, very commercial kind of picture-making

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the periods of being unsuccessful have made me a better actor

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: Shouting at people keeps you alive, healthy, young, fresh

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: Comic-Con is so legendary, so a great thrill to be invited along

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been interested in the idea of people who fell through the cracks

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: Real heroes are all around us and uncelebrated

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like parties. There was never a party I was at where I didn't wish I was somewhere else

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: Every viewer who ever turned on 'Doctor Who' has taken him into his heart. He belongs to all of us

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: It's weathered many a storm, but the British film industry is, thankfully, still afloat

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm pretty good for an old geek

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: A little showbiz never hurt anyone

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: Have an open mind - allow different ideas into your way of thinking

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: If the risk is fully aligned with your purpose and mission, then it's worth considering

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: 3D printing has digitized the entire manufacturing process

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: The old newspaper adage, 'If it bleeds, it leads,' is as true today as it was a century ago

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: If anyone has seen success and failure on a global stage, it's my friend Steve Forbes

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: I view risk-aversion as crippling America in many ways

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more precious than life... especially the life of your child

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad news sells because the amygdala is always looking for something to fear

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: The truest drive comes from doing what you love

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything that opens up people's perceptions a bit is good

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: Since I've joined 'Game of Thrones,' it's been such a pleasure

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: Does anybody actually go out in L.A.? When I lived there, I'd just stay in my apartment

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: I was fortunate enough to have an upbringing that made me more accepting of who I am

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: I never lived in an abandoned railroad station

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: I am this guy who's four and a half feet tall, but my life doesn't constantly address it

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: Even 'Lord of the Rings' had dwarf-tossing jokes in it. It's like, 'Really?'

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: You'd be surprised how condescending people can be

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: I dress and eat like a fifth-grader, basically. I like sandwiches and cereal and hooded sweatshirts

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: Dwarves are still the butt of jokes. It's one of the last bastions of acceptable prejudice

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: I lose things. I am preoccupied. I am misty. Eyeglasses? I go through eyeglasses like tissue

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just looking to get through the day

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: I never understood a word John Cassavetes said. And I think he did that deliberately

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: The only mountain that I would still like to climb: I'd like to break 85

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: My idea of Heaven is to wake up, have a good breakfast, and spend the rest of the day drawing

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: I came to Hollywood and nobody knew me. I was on a coupla TV shows

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: I did do my own stunts

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: You talk about what a director, he was smart. He said, Turn the camera on!

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: If it wasn't for the Mark Twain Masquers, I don't know where my life would have gone

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not an ace at small talk

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: Sarcasm is a Manchester trait

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: When you DJ, you're just on your own, which is nice because there's no argument

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather have ten people who are mad for it than ten thousand who aren't

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy for us tends to be has to do with who shouts the loudest!

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody is the same. If we were all the same it would be bloody boring

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: The chemistry involved made everything Factory did quite special

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: What I've learned is that life is a balance between idealism and realism

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: Bootleggers quake in fear of me ringing them on a Sunday afternoon. I call after dinner, usually

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: My big frustration in New Order was that they played the same tracks all the time

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: When you get the right people together, writing music becomes very effortless

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: The most honest form of filmmaking is to make a film for yourself

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: New Zealand is not a small country but a large village

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Film is such a powerful medium. It's like a weapon and I think you have a duty to self-censor

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Rivalry doesn't help anybody

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Filmmaking for me is always aiming for the imaginary movie and never achieving it

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing about 3-D is the dullness of the image

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was bullied and regarded as little bit of an oddball myself

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: As a filmmaker, you want nothing more than to have people say, 'I love your movie.'

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Bilbo Baggins. I relate really well to Bilbo!

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I never wanted to do 'The Hobbit' in the first place

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people continue to pretend that anchor people are reporters

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Always have a sense of humor about life - you'll need it - but always be courteous to boot

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an immigrant and I've always wanted to write something about America

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: The candidate out front on Labor Day has historically been the one who stayed ahead in November

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a little concerned about this notion everybody wants us to be objective

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: A couple of weeks is a long time in American politics

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: As a journalist, one tends to think there's nothing off limits

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Do I think I was put here on earth to be a journalist and to seek truth? No, I don't

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think a reporter should give advice or make predictions

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I am very mainstream - I'm committed to good works in my life

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: Definition of a victim: a person to whom life happens

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not actively involved in getting what you want, you don't really want it

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: It's your life. Live it with people who are alive. It tends to be contagious

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: Do what you love and the necessary resources will follow

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: The road to positivity is strewn with the abandoned vehicles of the faint-hearted

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear is something to be moved through, not something to be turned from

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: Choosing what you want to do, and when to do it, is an act of creation

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: To avoid situations in which you might make mistakes may be the biggest mistake of all

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: Our thoughts create our reality - where we put our focus is the direction we tend to go

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is not a struggle. It's a wiggle

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: I was apprehensive about bringing off this Homer

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never looked for women. When I was a teenager, perhaps

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the most gregarious of men and love good company, but never less alone when alone

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: My dear sir, it haunted me for the rest of my life

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't mind being a lord

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: Life turned out much better than I thought. I knew after a little while that I could act

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a legend. And to protest is daft

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, life has either been a wake or a wedding

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: The only exercise I take is walking behind the coffins of friends who took exercise

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't stand light. I hate weather

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: Art and literature are my surrogate religions

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: I was an accomplice in my own frustration

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything we feel is made of Time. All the beauties of life are shaped by it

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: Passion, you see, can be destroyed by a doctor. It cannot be created

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: If London is a watercolor, New York is an oil painting

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: Rehearsing a play is making the word flesh. Publishing a play is reversing the process

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people nowadays do tend to blame their parents for everything

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: The rhetoric is the key to the character. It's the verbal music of the piece

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I did have fantasies about being an actor. In fact, I know I did

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: I think possibly the first film that has music as its leading character

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there's anything in the compromise that means that there's a clash of ethics

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: I think ethics is always there; it's not always a very thoughtful or reflective ethics

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: More often there's a compromise between ethics and expediency

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: The notion that human life is sacred just because it is human life is medieval

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: Scholars have long dreamed of a universal library containing everything that has ever been written

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowing that we can control our own behaviour makes it more likely that we will

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet, like the steam engine, is a technological breakthrough that changed the world

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: You shouldn't say 'animals' to distinguish between humans and non-humans. We are all animals

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: We tend to think that people are more to blame for their acts than for their omissions

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it extraordinary that anyone would have an intellectual conversion to Roman Catholicism

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: I think anyone who has an opinion, and voices it, will offend someone

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: So I don't cry anymore, I just beat people up. It's a lot more fun

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: It's bad poetry executed by people that can't sing. That's my definition of Rap

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: I think all recent music sucks, and that includes Type O Negative

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, darkness with humor... I'm not an extremely suicidal or sad person

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: Instead of slashing my wrists, I just write a bunch of really crummy songs

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as humor goes, I've always been a very insecure person and I've always wanted to be liked

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: If they weren't laughing with me, okay; if they want to laugh at me it's better than nothing

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: I think aerobics are great, of course, but it just bores me out of my mind

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really like to play live. I don't like to be on stage. I feel very self-conscious

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: Technology just means information technology

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do something new, it will always look a little bit strange

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: How to teach people to do what hasn't been done is a great riddle

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always a sense that people will do things quite differently if they think they have privacy

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: The core problem in our society is political correctness

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a world in which courage is in less supply than genius

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: A diploma is a dunce hat in disguise

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: We protect monopolies with copyright

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: The future is limitless

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: There's absolutely no bubble in technology

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: Parents are the bones on which children cut their teeth

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: It is our responsibilities, not ourselves, that we should take seriously

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: If Botticelli were alive today he'd be working for Vogue

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: The habit of religion is oppressive, an easy way out of thought

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: Her virtue was that she said what she thought, her vice that what she thought didn't amount to much

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: Monica Seles: I'd hate to be next door to her on her wedding night

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: A diplomat these days is nothing, but a head waiter who is allowed to sit down occasionally

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is really an ambition which is beyond us

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: Pressure is something you feel when you don't know what the hell you're doing

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: I committed my life to Christ, and that faith has been most important to me ever since

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: My closest friends are from my high school days

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: I understand the seriousness of concussions

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the best Manning

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: Imitation is obviously a great form of flattery

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to retire. I still want to play

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like people to understand that I do have some personality

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: Some guys leave a place after a long time, and they're bitter. Not me

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to have played in the '60s. Now that would have been fun

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: An alliance with a powerful person is never safe

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Gentleness is the antidote for cruelty

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone ought to bear patiently the results of his own conduct

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Success tempts many to their ruin

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Things are not always as they seem; the first appearance deceives many

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: The intelligence of few perceives what has been carefully hidden in the recesses of the mind

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone is bound to bear patiently the results of his own example

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: A learned man has always riches in himself

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Submit to the present evil, lest a greater one befall you

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever is detected in a shameful fraud is ever after not believed even if they speak the truth

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to luggage, I am an underpacker

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm in the mood for room service, my favorite order is a peanut-butter-and-jelly sandwich

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I love when things are transparent, free and clear of all inhibition and judgment

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always consciously trying to make what I feel is missing

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I love what I do, I love my job

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just very thankful. And I say that a lot because that's the most important message

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the world

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, nothing is given

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I love when things are transparent, free and clear of all inhibition and judgement

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I only entertain very close friends

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a singer who plays a bit of drums. I'm a drummer that sings a bit

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: Beyond a certain point, the music isn't mine anymore. It's yours

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is in your hands, now use it

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: I've spent the last year and a half going through a very public separation, hiding in hotel lobbies

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just trying to do things that are interesting for me

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: It's actually come as quite a shock to learn just how many people don't like me

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: My only saving grace is that I actually collect things that nobody else is interested in

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: And, you know, I never wanted to be a singer

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not often that an English drummer gets an Oscar. So I'm very, very proud of that

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: That's going to be on my headstone: 'He came. He wrote 'In the Air Tonight.' He... died.'

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Deep ocean drilling is not new

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a career physician. I practiced for 32 years before I began my career as a public servant

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: As a physician for over 30 years, I am well aware of the dangers infectious diseases pose

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have hard edges

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I get along with people. But I don't sacrifice my principles either

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I will continue fighting to protect our Second Amendment rights

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as I am in the Congress, I will continue to fight for and defend our sacred values

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I have actively opposed every bailout, every rebate check, every so called 'stimulus.'

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I pledge to give all there is of myself

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not going to exploit, for political purposes, my opponent's youth and inexperience

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Always keep an open mind and a compassionate heart

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Pau is one of the best big men in the game. I mean, Pau Gasol is going to be in the Hall of Fame

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I gave it my body and mind, but I have kept my soul

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you meet the Buddha in the lane, feed him the ball

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the force that ignites the spirit and binds teams together

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I played hockey in North Dakota growing up and watch a lot of that

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to coach again. I've done my coaching, and I think I can put that aside

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Your problems never cease. They just change

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: The winter's a little bit daunting in Montana

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: Resilience is, of course, necessary for a warrior. But a lack of empathy isn't

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: War is complicated and intense, and it takes time and thoughts to understand what it was

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: I have, for a very long time, been a huge admirer of Marilynne Robinson, whose work I just love

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: Oftentimes, discussion of war gets flattened to a discussion of trauma

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: Responsibility and accountability is a big part of being in the military

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes macho language is to mask things people are not ready to deal with

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I've always liked about the military is there's a certain amount of pragmatism

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: Bombs do very, very bad things to human bodies. It's incredibly shocking to see

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: People have a very political way of looking at war, and that's understandable

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: I love opera. I love jazz, especially Mingus. This makes me sound highbrow. I'm not

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Simplicity is natures first step, and the last of art

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is man's nature; nature is God's art

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Respect is what we owe; love, what we give

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Prayer is the spirit speaking truth to Truth

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: America, thou half-brother of the world; with something good and bad of every land

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness is wisdom

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: The long days are no happier than the short ones

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Envy's a coal comes hissing hot from Hell

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: The sole equality on earth is death

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Man is a military animal, glories in gunpowder, and loves parade

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture is basically the design of interiors, the art of organizing interior space

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture is the art of how to waste space

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I always think of buildings in their settings, but so do other architects

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate vacations. If you can build buildings, why sit on the beach?

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't build a glass house if you're worried about saving money on heating

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: If architects weren't arrogant, they wouldn't be architects. I don't know a modest good architect

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing a house is so much harder than doing a skyscraper

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I got everything from someone. Nobody can be original

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm about four skyscrapers behind

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: All architects want to live beyond their deaths

Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane

Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: Strange how paranoia can link up with reality now and then

Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't try to solve serious matters in the middle of the night

Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: The Martians are always coming

Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is that which, when you stop believing in it, doesn't go away

Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: I am one of the elect, one of the few in the know, in the gnosis

Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: When I believe, I am crazy. When I don't believe, I suffer psychotic depression
